function_description: Open card view on the right side of the screen when a card is clicked
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application and is viewing a board with multiple cards displayed in lists.
steps: Locate a card within any list on the board.
Click on the card to open its detailed view.
Observe the right side of the screen where the card view should appear.
expected_state: The card view is displayed on the right side of the screen, allowing the user to view and manipulate card details while keeping the board visible.
